text: Carlos Roberto Massa (born February 15, 1956 in Águas de Lindóia) is a Brazilian broadcaster, businessman and presenter.http://televisao.uol.com.br/ultimas- noticias/2009/07/14/ult4244u3785.jhtm /UOL Ratinho grava suas primeiras cenas como ator em "Vende-se um Véu de Noiva"https://televisao.uol.com.br/noticias/redacao/2011/08/12/em-comemoracao- aos-30-anos-do-sbt-ratinho-interpreta-seu-barriga-em-remake-de-chaves.htm /Em comemoração aos 30 anos do SBT, Ratinho interpreta Seu Barriga em remake de "Chaves" He is also the father of the politician Ratinho Júnior. He was a politician in the late 1970s until the mid-1990s, when he was a councilor in Curitiba and a federal deputy for the National Reconstruction Party (PRN). He is the founder and owner of Grupo Massa, which operates in the areas of communication (Rede Massa), agribusiness, brand management and licensing. == References == Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Politicians from Paraná State Category:Brazilian businesspeople Category:Brazilian television presenters
title: Ratinho
